name: CreateCandidateOfferVersion
description:
Initiate a new offer version for a candidate.

Used to create and return an offer version instance for a candidate's in-progress offer process. This instance can then be filled out and submitted using the `offer.create` endpoint. Requires the `offersWrite` permission.

parameters.name: candidate_offer_process_id
parameters.description: The ID of the candidate's offer process for which a new offer version is initiated. This ID is required and must be valid for the offer process to be in progress.
